Articles.Content:
Hey,

I am new to this forum, to start of with.

My suggestion is:

Can anybody make a mod which has the Indian space research organisation (ISRO) satellites and rockets?

because I am very bad at 3d modelling and all, and I really want something like that.

Hope someone can make something like that.

Niranjan

Edited February 11, 2015 by Niranjan
